articles.description: 'Sports is connection,' host Tony Reali declared as ESPN's 'Around the Horn' signed off the air Friday after 23 years and more than 4,900 episodes.
articles.content:
Longtime ESPN host Tony Reali took his final lap “Around the Horn” on Friday, closing out the sports debate series after 23 years and more than 4,900 episodes.
ESPN set the end date months ago for t… [+3319 chars]

articles.author: Paul Kasabian
articles.title: LeBron James, Giannis, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander Headline 2024-25 All-NBA Teams - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Reigning NBA MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, three-time NBA MVP Nikola Jokić, two-time NBA MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo and now 21-time All-NBA Teamer LeBron James were among those who earned this year's All-NBA honors, which were announced on Friday.
